level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Motor vehicle exhaust emissions inspections, government vehicles, see § 50-1104.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-223
level.text: Law 19-223, the "Employee Transportation Amendment Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-354. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2012, and Oct. 2, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 5, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-534 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-223 became effective on Mar. 5, 2013.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 401 of D.C. Law 19-223 provided that §§ 101, 102, 104, 105(a), 105(b), 106, 107, 201(a), 201(b), 201(c), 202, 203, and 301 of the act shall apply as of Mar. 5, 2013.
Because of the codification of D.C. Law 19-223, §§ 101 to 107 as subchapter II of this chapter, the preexisting text, §§ 50-201 to 50-205, has been designated as subchapter I.
